name: My New Game
description:
A satirical look at violence in video games. "My New Game" addresses the absurdity of blaming real-world violence on violence in video games through a Postmodern lens. Question if there is any real meaning to any of this(?) Find out with us.

CONTROLS

  • Left Mouse Click - shoot
  • WASD - move
  • R - Reload

CREATORS

  • Darcy Glover - Developer/Programmer
  • Jasper Von Riegen - Developer/Programmer
  • Jack Hobbs  - Developer/Programmer
  • Andrew Marmara - Writer
